page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In school you can get jobs as teachers secretaries and dinner ladies and kitchen staff.There are lots of farming jobs from crop spraying to general agriculture.In clubs you can get a job as an assistant or organiser like in brownies or cubs.Churches need flower arrangers and cleaners.Pubs have jobs like bar tenders,stock keepers and assistant managers or caretakers.The cafes need cashiers, caretakers,cooks and managers.The garage has mechanics.Shops need assistants.There is not much opportunity for work in the block,so most people have to leave the Hardwick and surrounding area to find work.They usually go to Cambridge.The population has increased recently in Hardwick so there are some extra jobs coming into Hardwick.
